text: <@U7TAZ6V2Q> Can u send DM me the  links for the instance page?
Can confirm! We are currently rolling it out. Itâ€™s out to about 5% of portals today and should be out to all in a few weeks :slightly_smiling_face:
This has actually been there the whole time, it just never did anything.
Yeah I know, but apparently it still doesn't do anything ;)

The quickest fix would be to change the expression to `{% if contact.firstname %}` or some other contact property. We are currently very picky about indexing certain expressions so having the expression look for a specific property will help here

Has anyone built functionality for dynamic pages similar to the blog tool's "recommended posts" feature? I'd like to intelligently recommend content to visitors based on not only their current context, but also past behavior. I think "related content" would just be a matter of filtering based on tags or titles, but "recommended content" would require historical data that probably isn't accessible. Any guidance here would be appreciated.

Hey All, I have a question about hubDB. is it possible to make a field like an array, so i can have a checkbox section on my page? for an example, I have a car parts section and in that field I want to have a checkbox of all the car parts associated with that particular car. every car is a row from HubDB(dynamic page). any ideas on how to achieve this?
Use a multi select or if you want I have used a text field with comma separated values
if i use multi select field, can i iterate that hose values in a list and use it like a checkbox?

And what about a field where I have a heading like instructions, and inside i have steps for recreation. for an example instructions: step1: lorem ipsom, step2,lirem ipsom etc...  how is this achievable ?? Thanks!
